name: Hyatt Regency Boston
description: Ideally located in the Boston City Center area, Hyatt Regency Boston promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the property provides all you need for a good night's sleep. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Hyatt Regency Boston. Each guestroom is elegantly furnished and equipped with handy amenities. The property offers various recreational opportunities. Friendly staff, great facilities, and close proximity to all that Boston (MA) has to offer are three great reasons you should stay at Hyatt Regency Boston.Agoda

name: Boston Omni Parker House Hotel
description: On the Freedom Trail and a short walk from Boston Common, this luxury historic hotel features a full-service restaurant, a 24-hour business center, and WiFi. Thirteen historic sites from the Freedom Trail are in close proximity. The rooms at the Boston Omni Parker House Hotel have a flat-screen cable TV and an MP3 dock. Plush bathrobes, a coffee maker and ironing facilities are included. Parker’s Restaurant serves local specialties including Boston cream pie and the Parker House Roll. The Last Hooray offers a light fare, specialty cocktails and a large selection of brand whiskey. The hotel has a 24-hour fitness center and a map of local jogging trails. A backpack full of games and activities can be requested for children. The Omni Parker House is 2.7 mi from the Fenway Park and Logan International Airport is 4 mi away.

name: Hilton Boston Logan Airport
description: The airport's only connected and AAA Four Diamond hotel. Hilton Boston Logan Airport is located just two miles to downtown, connecting you to it all. Experience the convenience of being in your room in minutes, whether walking via directly connected, climate-controlled walkways or using our 24-hour courtesy shuttle. Complimentary shuttle also provides service to the subway, car rental facility, and water taxi. Text or call 617-681-8899 to request a ride. Just 10 minutes from Boston's key destinations and iconic neighborhoods including the Boston Convention & Exhibition Center, Hynes Center, Sea Port, and North-End. Located in a park-like setting, the hotel offers guests a unique vantage point of the Boston city skyline or aeronautical views from our well-appointed guest rooms. Each of our relaxing guest rooms feature triple-pane windows and lush bedding for a restful night's stay. From hearty breakfasts to light bites, our hotel provides innovative dishes prepared with the freshest ingredients. Looking for a pick-me-up? Café Presto offers Starbucks coffee, freshly baked pastries, and a variety of to-go options during the day as well as evening beer and wine options, while Connolly's Publik House believes in quality food and drink in a relaxed atmosphere. Stay connected with AAA Four Diamond Amenities for personal success on the road, including full-service dining options, room service, a grab-and-go cafe, Fitness Center, indoor pool, Digital Check-in and Digital Key, and 24-hour guest assistance via text. Create meaningful connections and engage attendees with over 30,000 square feet of space including two pillar-less ballrooms, spacious foyers for networking, sophisticated, media-ready boardrooms, and multi-purpose breakout rooms. Our unique indoor/outdoor catering spaces are the perfect back drop to design an incredible event experience any time of year.Hilton

name: The Westin Boston Seaport District
description: Whether you're traveling far or planning the staycation of a lifetime, make it count at The Westin Boston Seaport District. A vibrant neighborhood in an iconic city, the Seaport District offers rich history, world-famous attractions, and hidden gems for those who want to take the path less traveled. We are close to family-friendly fun at Boston Children's Museum, stunning exhibits at the Institute of Contemporary Art, and much more. Whatever adventure you choose, come home at the end of the day to stylish accommodations with everything you need to recharge for the next one when you book at our outstanding hotel. When you're not out exploring the city, enjoy our 24-hour WestinWORKOUT® Fitness Studio, plush Heavenly® Beds, full-service on-site Starbucks® and casual dining options.Marriott

name: Canopy by Hilton Boston Downtown
description: Surrounded by markets, restaurants, and parks, our hotel is tucked between downtown and Boston's historic North End. Our Canopy Bikes are perfect for sightseeing, with several trails and famous historic sites within half a mile. We're also within walking distance of TD Garden, Government Center, Faneuil Hall, and the Freedom Trail.Hilton

name: The Westin Copley Place, Boston
description: Step into a AAA Four-Diamond hotel in the celebrated Back Bay neighborhood of Boston, MA which is a short stroll from fine dining destinations and upscale clothing stores at Copley Place shopping mall. Boston Symphony Hall, Fenway Park and other downtown attractions are within easy reach of The Westin Copley Place, Boston. Explore with ease and return to family-friendly accommodations and amenities. Exercise at our 24-hour WestinWORKOUT Fitness Studio with Pelotons, eat at delicious on-site restaurants and sip on handcrafted cocktails at our welcoming lobby bar. In the evening, relax in a beautifully appointed, pet-friendly hotel room or suite with stylish décor, a signature Westin Heavenly Bed and a spacious bathroom. Our impressive 57,493 square feet of contemporary event space makes us a leading conference, wedding and event destination in downtown Boston, MA. We look forward to meeting you, providing for you and helping you hit your targets at The Westin Copley Place, Boston.Marriott

name: Element Boston Seaport District
description: Learn the definition of comfort at the Element Boston Seaport District. Rise and enjoy our complimentary hot breakfast offerings. Our Chef is ready to prepare your eggs, fresh to the style you desire, or fuel your day at our Chobani yogurt station. A quick two-mile trip from Boston airport, we're located across the street from the Boston Convention and Exhibition Center and nearby Black Falcon Cruise Terminal. We even have free loaner bikes available to help you avoid city traffic. Relax in a contemporary room or suite, with a fully equipped kitchen and an inspiring city view. Take a dip in our saltwater indoor pool and break a vacation sweat at our fitness center. Countless modern amenities will make your extended stay well worth the while. If you have to mix work with pleasure, make use of your in-room ergonomic workstation or book one of our meeting rooms for a productive environment. Whatever brings you to the area, know that our extended-stay hotel in Boston, MA, will treat you to an outstanding stay.Marriott

name: W Boston
description: Immerse in the music, fashion and art of the downtown district. W Boston is a contemporary hotel in downtown Boston, Massachusetts, of style and sophistication. Comfort awaits in boutique, renovated hotel rooms showcasing signature amenities, custom décor and stunning views of our iconic Theatre District. Your enhanced accommodations include slate-finished bathrooms, innovative entertainment technology and custom murals. Savor New England staples and international dishes at the Gallery Restaurant and W Lounge. We also offer vibrant event spaces for any gathering in this historic destination. When you're ready to tackle the city, attend a Broadway show, shop locally or explore celebrated attractions, including Fenway Park, New England Aquarium and Chinatown. Our luxury downtown Boston, MA hotel is refinement redefined.Marriott

name: Hotel Commonwealth
description: Located within walking distance of St. Marys Street MBTA Subway Station, Hotel Commonwealth provides guests with an ideal base while in Boston. Some of the popular features at this luxury 4-star hotel include a rooftop terrace and free Wi-Fi. There are a range of amenities on offer to those staying at Hotel Commonwealth, including 24-hour room service, meeting rooms and valet parking. Corporate facilities include a 24-hour business centre. Every traditional room at Hotel Commonwealth provides a refrigerator and all the necessities for a comfortable stay. During their stay at the hotel, guests can enjoy a meal at Island Creek Oyster Bar, which offers a menu including seafood specialties. In the evening, guests are able to relax in the comfortable lounge bar. Located a 10-minute walk from Hynes Convention Center MBTA Station, Hotel Commonwealth offers helpful staff to provide tips on what to see in Boston. Guests will find a wide range of restaurants and shops in the area.HotelsCombined

name: Seaport Hotel Boston
description: Located on the waterfront in the bustling Seaport District, the AAA Four Diamond Seaport Boston Hotel offers luxurious accommodations with stunning city and harbor views and incredibly convenient access to all major points of interest. Seaport Boston Hotels gracious and accommodating staff provides unparalleled service, and the hotels innovative amenities, including complimentary wireless internet access, service-inclusive policy and complimentary use of Wave Health & Fitness are sure to delight.iHotelier/iStay

name: The Dagny Boston
description: Location The hotel is located on Broad Street, three blocks from Faneuil Hall Marketplace in Boston, Massachusetts. The New England Aquarium, Boston Harbour and The Freedom Trail are three blocks away. Logan International Airport is located less than 63.5 km from the hotel. Facilities The hotel features 362 accommodation units. Guests of the hotel are welcomed in the lobby, which has a 24-hour reception and a 24-hour check-out service. Lift access is provided to the upper floors. Amenities include a cloakroom and a safe. Internet access and wireless internet access are available in the public areas. Gastronomic options include a restaurant, a dining area, a breakfast room and a bar. Guests can buy holiday mementos from the souvenir shop. Shopping facilities are available. Additional features of the hotel include a newspaper stand and a library. Guests travelling in their own vehicles can make use of the available parking spaces (for a fee). Guests can also use the bicycle storage facilities. Additional services include room service and a laundry. A conference area with a conference room and a business centre is available. Rooms All rooms feature air conditioning, central heating, a living room and a bathroom. Bathrooms with wheelchair access can also be booked. The carpeted accommodation units feature a double bed, a king-size bed or a sofa-bed. A minibar is also available. A fridge, a mini-fridge, a microwave and tea and coffee making equipment contribute to a comfortable stay. An ironing set is also available to guests. Each accommodation unit offers internet access, a telephone, a TV, a radio, a stereo system and an alarm clock. Wheelchair-accessible accommodation units are also bookable. Each of the bathrooms features a shower, a bathtub, a hairdryer and bathrobes. Sports/Entertainment The hotel offers guests leisure options, including a gym. Meals The hotel offers the following bookable meals and board options: breakfast, lunch and dinner. Payment The following credit cards are accepted at the hotel: American Express, VISA and MasterCard.WebBeds

name: Hyatt Regency Boston Harbor
description: Located at the Logan International Airport, this Hyatt with soundproof rooms features free transportation to the airport terminals and is 4 miles from the Boston Common and the Freedom Trail. Views of Boston and the Boston Harbor can be enjoyed from some rooms at the Hyatt Boston Harbor. The rooms also have a flat-screen cable TV and an iPod docking station. Exercising in the on-site fitness center is an option for guests staying at the Boston Harbor Hyatt. The hotel also has on-site dining. The ferry to downtown Boston is available at the Logan Aiport Ferry Terminal and is nearby the hotel. Faneuil Hall and Quincy Market are within a 9-minute drive of the hotel. The USS Constitution and the USS Constitution Museum are 5 miles away.

name: Hyatt Centric Faneuil Hall Boston
description: Located in the heart of Downtown Boston, this Hyatt is a short walk from shopping and dining at historic Faneuil Hall. Guests can work up a sweat in the fitness center or grab a bite to eat at the on-site restaurant. Complimentary WiFi is provided for all guests. Boston Common is a 7 minutes' walk from the hotel. Rooms feature a 55-inch flat-screen TV with cable channels. A refrigerator and coffee maker are provided as well. Amenities such as Bluetooth speakers and blackout curtains are offered as well. Guests will appreciate the convenience of in-room dining. Business travelers will enjoy the business center and meeting facilities. The Lobby Bar offers handmade cocktails. Boston Tea Party Ship & Museum is 1969 feet from Hyatt Centric Faneuil Hall Boston, while Quincy Market is a 10-minute walk away. Logan Airport is 3.7 mi from the property.

name: Aloft Boston Seaport District
description: Aloft Boston Seaport District moves to its own beat. Sitting steps from South Boston, we’re neighbors with Lawn on D and their pickleball courts, Boston Convention & Exhibition Center, the Leaderbank Pavilion, the Boston Tea Party Museum and endless nightlife outlets. Fuel your fun-filled day in Boston with our Re:Fuel breakfast and end the night with a David Bowie-themed cocktail with live performances at our WXYZ Bar. If you’re here to get things done, host your meeting in one of our various tech-savvy, vibrant spaces. Our chef curated an event menu that’ll rock your world. When you’re free take a dip in our indoor pool, shoot the cue at our pool table, or play cornhole outside in our Backyard patio. We get it; pets are family too – we have everything you need to make your pet feel at home! Our South Boston hotel welcomes all self-expressers for any type of travel. Treat you or your guests to creative inspirations at every corner today.Marriott

name: Hyatt Place Boston/Seaport District
description: Located in Boston, 0.7 mi from Boston Convention Exhibitors Center, Hyatt Place Boston/Seaport District provides accommodations with a restaurant, private parking, a fitness center and a terrace. Among the facilities at this property are a 24-hour front desk and an ATM, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is 1.5 mi from Freedom Trail and 1.6 mi from Custom House. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a continental or an American breakfast. Guests at Hyatt Place Boston/Seaport District will be able to enjoy activities in and around Boston, like cycling. There is an on-site snack bar and guests can also make use of the business area. Old State House is 1.4 mi from the accommodations, while Faneuil Hall is 1.5 mi away. The nearest airport is Logan Airport, 3.7 mi from Hyatt Place Boston/Seaport District. Per the City of Boston, beginning January 15, 2022, to address rising COVID-19 cases and encourage vaccination, individuals will be required to show proof of vaccination against COVID-19 in order to enter certain indoor spaces in Boston. For our hotel this would apply for the gym, 9Dot bar and breakfast area. Those unable to show proof of vaccination can take the food to go.

name: Hotel Aka Boston Common
description: Conveniently located in the center of the city, this 4-star hotel makes for an excellent base in Boston. It is close to Boston Freedom Trail, restaurants and shops. There are a variety of facilities at Hotel AKA Boston Common that guests can enjoy, such as free Wi-Fi, an express check-in and check-out feature and a gym. Staff are available 24/7 and can book tours and tickets. Rooms at Hotel AKA Boston Common provide a stylish space to relax, complete with an iPod docking station and a flat-screen TV. Each includes its very own bathroom with bathrobes and a hair dryer. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal spot to enjoy a meal. The hotel is ideally located for exploring Boston with Faneuil Hall and Boston Commons within a 10-minute walk. It is also within walking distance of New England Aquarium and TD Garden.HotelsCombined

name: Raffles Boston
description: A celebration of Boston's exceptional talent, culture and character. In the heart of the Back Bay neighborhood, surrounded by historic brownstones, storied cultural institutions, bustling sidewalk cafes and chic boutiques, Raffles Boston offers an unmatched experience for those who want to discover the City of Notions at its finest. A captivating gastronomic destination sparking curiosity at every turn, this stately home is where culture meets indulgence.accorhotels.com

name: Hampton Inn Boston Seaport District
description: Our hotel near the waterfront is five minutes' walk from Flynn Cruise Terminal. The BCEC, wharf parks, Leader Bank Pavilion, and local dining are all within a mile. We have comforts covered with breakfast, WiFi, a business center, and 24-hour fitness center – all free. Enjoy our indoor pool and host a meeting in a sunlit ballroom with harbor views.Hilton

name: The Langham, Boston
description: This historic, newly renovated 5-star hotel in downtown Boston was originally the Federal Reserve Bank. It overlooks Norman B. Leventhal Park and features gourmet dining, guestrooms and event spaces, a heated indoor swimming pool and a 24-hour fitness center. A 50-inch LED HD-TV with streaming capabilities and mini-bar are in every Hotel Langham room. The Faneuil Hall Marketplace, New England Aquarium and the Freedom Trail Foundation are all one-half mile from The Langham, Boston. The Boston Convention Center is 1 mile away. Italian family-style meals are prepared in Grana, the new classic restaurant located in the former Federal Reserve Bank’s grand hall. The Fed, a cocktail bar will serve craft cocktails, beers and elevated pub dishes. Each room is designed with blue colors with custom furniture and features an Italian marble bathroom with plush bathrobes and slippers.

name: Mandarin Oriental, Boston
description: This 5-star hotel is located in the historic Back Bay district in Boston. It offers a full-service spa, a gourmet restaurant and a full-service gym. WiFi access is available. Each room at the Mandarin Oriental Boston will provide you with a TV, a mini-bar and designer linens. En suite marble bathrooms feature a bath or shower. Extras include a seating area, a DVD player and cable channels. The on-site spa is one of the only Forbes Five-Star awarded spas in Massachusetts. Guests can also enjoy the on-site French restaurant Bar Boulud as well as cocktails at the hotel's M Bar & Lounge. Other facilities at the Mandarin Oriental Boston include a fitness center, a ticket service and on-site shopping. The hotel is located next to The Shops at Prudential Center, 656 feet from Hynes Convention Center and 984 feet from Prudential Tower. Logan International Airport is 3.7 mi away.

name: The Liberty, a Luxury Collection Hotel, Boston
description: The Liberty, a Luxury Collection Hotel, in Boston, blends history, sophistication and hometown warmth and is the ideal place for a quintessentially Boston experience. Located at the foot of Beacon Hill, our Boston Jail hotel is steps away from outdoor fun on the Esplanade and posh shopping along Charles Street. A national historic landmark and architectural gem built in 1851, this refined 298-room hotel originated as the storied Charles Street Jail. Today, our prominent location showcases sweeping views of the Boston city skyline and the Charles River, along with five distinct food and beverage venues and 14,000 square feet of meeting space. Reserve your stay at The Liberty Hotel and delight in our rich history, unique architecture and a team of passionate New England natives, ready to create an unrivaled guest experience in Boston, MA.Marriott

name: Embassy Suites Boston at Logan Airport
description: Complimentary 24-hour shuttle service to Logan International Airport. All two room suites. Next to Logan International Airport. Less than 2 miles from Downtown Boston. A first-rate option for Boston Logan Airport hotels When traveling to historic Boston, check-in to the Embassy Suites Boston Hotel - at Logan Airport and be welcomed with amply appointed hotel accommodations and warm hospitality in an unmatched locale. Boston Logan Airport and to the MBTA Blue Line Subway Station. Whether in town for meetings or sightseeing, this Boston, Massachusetts hotel places you within easy reach of famous Boston tourist attractions from historical destinations and museums to universities and sports venues including: Bayside Expo Center - 6 miles, Boston Downtown Crossing - 3.9 miles, Boston Duck Tours - 6.0 miles, Boston Museum of Science - 5.7 miles, Boston University - 7.35 miles, Bunker Hill Monument - 5.5 miles, Faneuil Hall - 3 miles, Fenway Park, Home of the Boston Red Sox - 8 miles, Freedom Trail - 4 miles, Harvard University - 8 miles, Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT) - 7 miles, New England Aquarium - 4 miles, TD Banknorth Garden, Home of the Boston Celtics - 5 miles, USS Constitution - 4 miles. Unpack your bags in our hotel and relax in a spacious two-room suite, surrounded by the touches of home, including a sofa bed, microwave, wet bar, coffee maker and high-speed Internet access. Thoughtful conveniences continue throughout our Logan Airport hotel with extensive on-site facilities and amenities, such as: Business Center, so you can meet your last-minute deadlines, Complimentary Breakfast, a delicious start to your day, Complimentary Shuttle, transporting guests to Logan Airport and the MBTA Blue Line subway terminal, Heated Indoor Pool and whirlpool, to unwind after an eventful day, Fitness Center, so you can stay on top of your exercise regimen, Meeting & Event Space, a top choice for Boston corporate events, featuring over 8,000 square feet for up to 300 guests. Make your hotel reservations at Embassy Suites to experience one of the most ideally located hotels near downtown and Boston Logan Airport. Leisure visitors can hop on the Old Towne Trolley Tours bus just outside our doors and business guests will appreciate our proximity to the Boston Convention & Exhibition Center and the Boston Financial District. Book your stay online at the Embassy Suites Boston, MA hotel - at Logan Airport hotel to take advantage of our Lowest Internet Rate Guarantee. Don't forget to check our valuable Boston hotel deals for spectacular savings!Hilton

name: Battery Wharf Hotel, Boston Waterfront
description: Located in the North End by Boston Harbor, Battery Wharf Hotel is a 10-minute walk from the New England Aquarium and offers a private water taxi to Logan International Airport. It features an on-site Exhale Spa. Each contemporary guest room at The Battery Wharf Hotel and Spa is equipped with a 42-inch flat-screen TV, a hardwood desk and a Nespresso coffee machine. The bathroom has a walk-in shower and vanity mirror with bathrobes. The on-site gym features a variety of cardio machines open 24 hours. The Battery Wharf Hotel is located right on the Boston Harbor Walk with a Maritime Museum on-site. The TD Garden is 0.5 mi away, Faneil Hall Marketplace is 0.2 mi away, The Boston Opera House is 1.7 mi away, while the Boston Tea Party Ships and Museum is 0.7 mi away from the hotel.

name: Wyndham Boston Beacon Hill
description: Wyndham Boston Beacon Hill offers an envious downtown location with easy to access Bostons top businesses, Hospitals and Universities. Enjoy complimentary Wi-Fi, bottled water, in room safe, in room coffee, access to our fitness room and business center. Many rooms feature views of the Charles River or Beacon Hill Skyline. Executive Rooms offer 20% off of food at Dean's List Restaurant, bathrobes, and refrigerators. In cooler seasons, cozy up by the fire in our lobby and dine in our full-service restaurant, Deans List, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, as well as room service. On the top floor of the hotel, eight customizable meeting rooms with panoramic views of the Charles River are available for social events and meetings. Walk to Mass General Hospital, TD Garden, Boston Public Common, Freedom Trail, Faneuil Hall Marketplace, and Bostons Italian North End. Logan International Airport is just 2.8 miles away.Wyndham

name: The Eliot Hotel
description: Built in 1925, the historic Eliot Hotel is located in Boston’s Back Bay neighborhood. It offers an on-site sashimi bar and elegantly decorated rooms with down comforters and marble bathrooms. Each room is equipped with soundproof windows, flat-screen TVs and WiFi internet. The Eliot’s guests can enjoy free access to the Boston Sports Club and on-site business center. Concierge desk staff can arrange dinner reservations or nightly turndown service. Babysitting and petsitting are also available. The restaurant Uni is located in the hotel and features a Japanese sushi bar and small plates. The Eliot is less than five minutes away from Hynes Convention Center. Nearby shopping includes the Prudential Shopping Center and Newbury Street shops. Fenway Park, home of the Boston Red Sox, is 2953 feet away.

name: Hotel Aka Back Bay
description: This historic Back Bay district hotel is located in the former headquarters of the Boston Police Department. Free Wi-Fi is provided throughout the hotel and an on-site grill is available. Copley Square and Boston Common are both less than 1640 feet away. The modern, decorative rooms of the Hotel AKA Back Bay feature a 46-inch flat-screen TV. Ironing facilities and a work desk are included. Guests can also enjoy Apothecary, a lobby lounge. An on-site fitness center and a business center are open at all times for guests. Hotel AKA Back Bay is 1.6 mi from Fenway Park. The Boston Back Bay train station is a 5-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Indigo Boston Garden, An IHG Hotel
description: Nestled near North Station and TD Garden, and three miles from Logan Airport, Hotel Indigo Boston Garden offers comfort and convenience. Our renovated, pet-friendly, boutique hotel is steeped in history. Experience spacious rooms and a restaurant that blends hearty pub fare with New England charm. Enjoy our 24-hour fitness center, boardroom, and free Wi-Fi. The ideal hotel for attending Boston concerts, we’re also close to the financial center, JFK Building and GSA, healthcare facilities like Massachusetts General Hospital and Massachusetts Eye Ear, and universities like Harvard, Boston University, MIT, and Boston College. Follow the Freedom Trail and explore Faneuil Hall, Paul Revere's house, and Boston Harbor. Begin your Boston adventure.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: The Row Hotel at Assembly Row, Autograph Collection
description: Where bold character and uncommon details meet, The Row Hotel at Assembly Row, Autograph Collection is an original boutique hotel in Somerville, MA designed for the modern traveler. Combining historic charm with a modern twist, this once Ford Motor Assembly Plant offers travelers an escape from the predictable in vibrant Assembly Row – a center of shopping, dining and entertainment near Boston. At our hotel near the Boston Casino, unique perspectives and warm hospitality combine with heartfelt designs to create curated experiences, from our 24-hour fitness center and heated indoor pool, to rooms and suites that offer a sense of place, with personal touches like pillow top mattresses, ergonomic workspaces and comfy bath robes. We have over 4,000 square-feet of distinguished event venues and access to The T, with transit service to downtown Boston, TD Garden, Fenway Park, and the Boston Convention & Exhibition Center. From the warm welcome to tailored comforts, discover uncommon at our Assembly Row hotel!Marriott

name: Boston Harbor Hotel
description: Boston Harbor Hotel is conveniently located in the popular Boston City Center area. The property offers a wide range of amenities and perks to ensure you have a great time. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at Boston Harbor Hotel. Flat screen television, carpeting, linens, mirror, towels can be found in selected guestrooms. To enhance guests' stay, the property offers recreational facilities such as fitness center, sauna, indoor pool, spa, massage. No matter what your reasons are for visiting Boston (MA), Boston Harbor Hotel will make you feel instantly at home.Agoda

name: Studio Allston Hotel
description: Located in Boston, Studio Allston Hotel is a short drive from Harvard University and Boston Commons. It provides 3.5-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. This unique hotel offers an on-site fitness centre, meeting rooms and a playground. In addition, the multilingual staff are available to offer assistance. Rooms at Studio Allston Hotel are comfortable and feature a refrigerator, a microwave and cable/satellite channels. They are all soundproofed and include a laptop safe, a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV. For those wishing to dine out during their stay at Studio Allston Hotel, there are a variety of restaurants located nearby. The hotel also offers parking for those travelling by car.Revato

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Boston Back Bay/Fenway
description: Our newly renovated all-suite hotel is conveniently located steps away from Fenway Park and is the closest extended-stay hotel to Boston University, Northeastern University, Colleges of the Fenway and the Longwood Medical Center. Enjoy our stunning views overlooking Fenway Park from the only Rooftop Bar in the Fenway neighborhood, making for an ideal starting point before and after a Red Sox game. We are also close to the House of Blues and the all-new MGM Music Hall – both great venues for catching a show! Explore the city of Boston and enjoy some fabulous shopping and dining at the world-famous Newbury Street or at the Prudential and Copley Malls – both just a 20-minute walk away. Stop by the Time Out Market Place and explore dining options from the top chefs in Boston. Alternatively, you can take a bike ride along the Charles River and enjoy the views. Plus, at our hotel near Back Bay Boston, we also have a great indoor swimming pool that is always a big hit for the entire family!Marriott

name: Homewood Suites by Hilton Boston Seaport District
description: We're near the waterfront, a five-minute walk from the Flynn Cruise Terminal. The BCEC, Rockland Trust Bank Pavilion, wharf dining, and several museums are within a mile. Join us for free breakfast, or prep favorites in your suite's full kitchen. An indoor pool and 24-hour fitness center await, and we have sunlit ballrooms and two outdoor terraces for events.Hilton

name: The Charles Hotel
description: Set in the heart of Harvard Square, this luxurious Cambridge hotel combines classic New England style with award-winning dining, elegant guestrooms and 24-hour personalized concierge services. Each of the rooms at The Charles Hotel in Harvard Square offers flat-screen TVs and DVD players. Guests can also enjoy free access to a nearby state-of-the-art fitness center as well as the on-site library and wireless internet access. While staying at the Charles, guests can take advantage of gourmet on-site dining options, such as the vibrant jazz club, the Regattabar. Classic New England cuisine is available at Henrietta's Table and rustic Italian dishes are featured at Benedetto. Popular area attractions, including the famed Harvard University are only moments from the Charles in Harvard Square. A number of charming cafes, shops and restaurants are also easily accessible. Boston city center is a short drive away with on-site car hire services.

name: Onyx Boston Downtown
description: Next to TD Garden in downtown Boston, our hotel is within walking distance of the city’s top attractions. Quincy Market, Haymarket, Boston City Hall, and the Old North Church are a half-mile walk away. We’re also close to transit stations, government offices, and dozens of restaurants.Hilton

name: Sheraton Commander Hotel
description: Timeless elegance is interwoven with modern conveniences at Sheraton Commander Hotel in Cambridge, Massachusetts. Our hotel near Harvard Square is located near boutiques and restaurants as well as prestigious academic institutions such as Massachusetts Institute of Technology, Harvard University and Tufts University. Paying homage to our colonial heritage, our hotel boasts a modern design with subtle, revolutionary-era flair. Amenities such as free high-speed Wi-Fi, flat-panel TVs and plush bedding transform our hotel rooms into a quaint retreat amid the bustle of Harvard Square. Nubar, our on-site restaurant, serves classic New England cuisine with an innovative twist. If business brings you to Cambridge, our hotel in Cambridge, MA, features five elegant meeting venues, AV equipment and custom catering services, ideal for networking events and corporate conferences. From our paramount location to our thoughtful amenities, you can expect a legendary stay at Sheraton Commander Hotel.Marriott

name: Four Seasons Hotel Boston
description: Located within steps of the Boston Common and the Public Garden, this Four Seasons has rooms with views of Boston. The hotel has facilities like an indoor pool, fitness center and spa. A flat-screen cable TV is included in every room at the Boston Four Seasons. There are also free toiletries, slippers and a bathrobe in the private bathroom. On-site dining at the Bistro Lounge offers breakfast, lunch and dinner. The Boston Opera House is 2297 feet from the hotel. The train at Arlington Station is 656 feet away.

name: Four Seasons Hotel One Dalton Street, Boston
description: Featuring a bar, Four Seasons Hotel One Dalton Street, Boston is located in the center of Boston, a 4-minute walk from Hynes Convention Center. Offering a restaurant, the property also has free bikes, as well as an indoor pool and a fitness center. Free WiFi is available and private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. All rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The rooms are equipped with a coffee machine, while some rooms also feature a terrace and others also feature city views. At Four Seasons Hotel One Dalton Street, Boston every room includes bed linen and towels. Speaking English, Spanish and French at the reception, staff are ready to help around the clock. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Back Bay, Boston Museum of Fine Arts and Fenway Park. The nearest airport is Logan Airport, 5.6 miles from Four Seasons Hotel One Dalton Street, Boston.

name: Cambria Hotel Boston Somerville
description: Enjoy an upscale stay in the heart of one of the trendiest neighborhoods in Boston. Between Union and Porter Squares, the Cambria Hotel Boston Somerville in Somerville is just over a half mile from Harvard University and near Tufts University and MIT. Join us for dinner at Josephine which is is a celebration of family and food thats focused on pizza, Italian favorites and the simple pleasure of dining together. The hotel is also across the street from Somernova, a business park and innovation incubator. Walk to restaurants, cocktail lounges and breweries. Modern guestrooms offer plush bedding and spa inspired bathrooms with oversize showers and Bluetooth mirrors. Each room also features free WiFi and a flatscreen TV, as well as conveniences like a desk space, a refrigerator and a coffee maker.Choice Hotels

name: InterContinental Boston
description: Historic elegance meets modern luxury at the InterContinental Boston. Our waterfront hotel, located on the Boston Harbor, is one of the city's most celebrated hotels in a truly iconic location. Our beautifully redesigned rooms showcase the Boston cityscape with floor to ceiling windows. Whether hosting an event or relaxing in our Spa InterContinental, you will appreciate the close proximity to Boston’s most sought-after landmarks, like the Boston Tea Party & Ships Museum.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: The Verb Hotel
description: Situated within walking distance of St. Marys Street MBTA Subway Station, The Verb Hotel provides guests with a convenient base while visiting Boston. It has a gym, as well as an outdoor pool, a 24-hour reception and free Wi-Fi. This modern hotel provides a number of facilities, such as luggage storage, a concierge and a car rental desk. In addition, the multilingual staff are available to offer local information. The air conditioned rooms at The Verb Hotel are well-appointed. They feature blackout curtains, a refrigerator and an in-room safe. In-house dining options include Hojoko, which provides an ideal place to enjoy a meal. Boston's attractions, including Kenmore Square and Back Bay Fens, are within easy walking distance of The Verb Hotel. It is also within walking distance of Berklee College of Music, the Museum of Fine Arts and Northeastern University.Revato

name: La Quinta Inn & Suites by Wyndham Boston Somerville
description: Your La Quinta Inn & Suites Boston hotel in Somerville is HERE FOR YOU! Whether you are here for business or to take in the sights and sounds of the birthplace of American liberty, you can be assured your stay with us will be comfortable and enjoyable. Conveniently located off of I-93 and only two miles from downtown Boston, our hotel is located in the trendy Assembly Row area of Somerville. Boston's rich and colorful history is at your fingertips with convenient access to the MBTA (commonly referred to as the "T") located within walking distance of the hotel. Our complimentary shuttle service is available to transport you to and from Logan International Airport (contact hotel to schedule). Whether your adventure brings you to Boston, Somerville or Cambridge, you are guaranteed to be at the center of it all! Boston boasts a winning sports tradition with the Boston Red Sox at Fenway Park (5 mi) along with the Bruins and Celtics at TD Bank Garden (2 mi). If sightseeing is your game, Faneuil Hall/Quincy Market is only a short "T" ride away. Within walking distance from the hotel, Assembly Row boasts a unique shopping, dining, and entertainment experience including SAKS 5th Avenue OFF FIFTH, Earl's Restaurant, AMC IMAX Theatre and LEGOLAND Discovery Center.Boston is known for higher education with Harvard, MIT and Tufts among the many major colleges and universities in the area. Business is a necessity, and be assured our location guarantees you can get the job done! The Boston and Hynes Convention Centers, Financial District, Cabot and Schrafts Office Parks and Mass General Hospital are easily accessible from our hotel. At your La Quinta Inn & Suites Boston hotel in Somerville you will find friendly service, comfortable accommodations, and exceptional value. Our 147 spacious rooms and suites equipped with comfy pillow-top mattresses will provide a relaxing night's sleep. Wake up refreshed and energized with our Free Bright Side Breakfast including hot waffles, coffee, juice, breads, muffins, cereal, and fresh fruit. Unwind with a workout in our state-of-the-art fitness center, enjoy free Wi-Fi, and take advantage of our onsite business center. Parking is included in your stay or leave the driving to us with our free shuttle to Boston Logan International Airport, the T, and Mass General Hospital (contact hotel to schedule). All rooms include a refrigerator, HD TV with complimentary Showtime, coffee maker, iron, ironing board, hair dryer, and free high-speed Wi-Fi.Whether it is work or leisure that brings you to the area, your La Quinta Inn & Suites Boston hotel in Somerville is READY FOR YOU! Let our warm hospitality, friendly staff and outstanding accommodations be the beginning to your Boston adventure!Free parking available to overnight guests only. Stay and Go packages are available that include extended parking for up to 7 days.Wyndham

name: Global Luxury Suites Downtown Boston
description: Located in Boston, a 8-minute walk from Boston Common and 700 yards from the center, Global Luxury Suites Downtown Boston has air-conditioned accommodations with free Wifi, and a shared lounge. Featuring a kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, each unit also comes with a cable flat-screen TV, ironing facilities, wardrobe and a seating area with a sofa. There's a private bathroom with walk-in shower in all units, along with a hair dryer and free toiletries. The apartment offers a business center for guest use. Popular points of interest near Global Luxury Suites Downtown Boston include Boston South Station, Boston Public Garden and Boston Tea Party Ship & Museum. The nearest airport is Logan Airport, 4.3 miles from the accommodation.

name: The Ritz-Carlton Boston
description: With an enviable location opposite Boston Common, The Ritz-Carlton, Boston provides contemporary urban luxury in downtown Boston, MA. Our 193 hotel rooms and suites feature expansive views and sleek styling, and fully updated meeting spaces offer a welcoming atmosphere for conferences and social events. Additional hotel features include the Avery Bar, with its signature martinis and mid-century glamour, and the adjoining Equinox Sports Club. Explore all that our luxury hotel in downtown Boston has to offer.Marriott

name: Best Western Adams Inn Quincy-Boston
description: The Best of Boston in Quincy! Take advantage of great services and amenities at this Boston area hotel at affordable rates guaranteed! Conveniently located just five miles south of Boston on Interstate 93, The Best Western Adams Inn Quincy-Boston is the ideal setting for business, social events, or vacations. Accommodations are provided for both business and leisure guests at a great value. Close to the Boston convention and exhibition centers and the Quincy historical and business districts near State Street Corporation, Blue Cross/Blue Shield of MA and Boston Scientific-yet peacefully located on the Neponset River. Guests who stay at the Best Western Adams Inn Quincy-Boston have the advantage of taking care of business and unwinding all in the same place! After a tough day on the road relax at our Adams Pub and enjoy delicious New England fare in our cozy and comfortable atmosphere. All 105 guest rooms are equipped with free high-speed wireless internet and provide plenty of space for your needs. The Best Western Adams Inn Quincy-Boston is less than five miles to the Boston Seaport World Trade Center, Bayside Expo Center and the Boston Convention and Exhibition Center. Local attractions such as the John F. Kennedy Library, Adam's Historical National Park, Fenway Park (Home of the Red Sox), New England Aquarium and Quincy market are minutes away. Business and Social Groups will enjoy our outstanding meeting and conference facilities, including our Constitution Pavilion and our unique waterfront landing and gazebo where your group can enjoy an authentic New England fare. You must be 21 years of age to book a room at our hotel.bestwestern.com

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Boston Cleveland Circle
description: Connect to the city in a new way at AC Boston Hotel Cleveland Circle, located at the crossroads of academia and athletics, history and entertainment, Boston and Brookline. Infused with European style, Spanish flair, and Boston soul, our boutique hotel offers innovative spaces, tailored to the needs of creative, well-traveled, entrepreneurial spirits, including a daily European-style breakfast and free WiFi throughout the hotel, 50-inch Smart TVs, comfortable pillow-top mattresses and ergonomic inroom workspaces. A convenient business center, flexible event venues, and a 24-hour fitness center allow you to work and meet where you choose. Every evening, unwind at the AC Lounge, where our bartenders serve handcrafted cocktails to pair with specialty tapas. Our hotel is also ideally located near Boston University, Fenway Park, Agganis Arena, Reservoir and Cleveland Circle Stations, MBTA Green Line, for further Boston adventures. Welcome to an elevated state of mind.Marriott

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Boston Harbor on Tudor Wharf
description: Boston's rich history is right outside your door when you stay at the Residence Inn by Marriott Boston Harbor on Tudor Wharf. Our all-suite hotel near downtown Boston is conveniently located and within walking distance of the historic North End, Boston Harbor and TD Garden. Our waterfront Boston hotel offers a choice of studio, one- or two-bedroom suites, all with amazing Boston Harbor views and beautiful interior decor. Unique amongst Boston extended stay hotels, our hotel offers a stylish retreat at a substantial value; free Wi-Fi access, a complimentary daily hot breakfast buffet, a heated indoor pool and an evening mix Monday through Wednesday. All our beautiful suites come equipped with full kitchens, refrigerators, cooktops, separate living and dining areas, and ample space to relax or entertain. Escape from typical Boston hotels and discover the distinctive style of the Residence Inn, a Marriott extended stay Harbor view hotel in Boston.Marriott

name: Hilton Boston Park Plaza
description: Daily Mandatory Charge will be added to the room rate and includes: Premium guest internet access; daily $15 food and beverage credit (excludes room service); daily $15 dry cleaning credit; Lynx Fitness Club access; Press Reader access. We’re located in downtown Boston, surrounded by shopping, dining and entertainment. The Public Garden and Boston Common are steps away from us, while Beacon Hill and the Theater District are within a half-mile. As one of Boston’s most historic hotels, we are conscious about our community’s wellbeing and committed to uplifting the people and places that make our city thrive.Hilton

name: Fairmont Copley Plaza Boston
description: Fairmont Copley Plaza is a luxury downtown Boston landmark hotel that has been a symbol of the city's rich history and elegance since its gala opening in 1912. Centrally located the hotel is just steps away from area attractions, restaurants and shops. Savor fine seasonal cuisine and signature craft cocktails at our award-winning American brasserie, OAK Long Bar + Kitchen, host an event for 1,100 in the Grand Ballroom or be inspired by city panoramas in the rooftop fitness center.accorhotels.com

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Boston Downtown
description: Connect to the city in a new way at AC Hotel Boston Downtown, a hotel in Boston, MA located at the intersection of past and present, revolution and academia, rich culture and sports-fueled pride. Thoughtful service & modern mindset define our hotel near Tufts Medical Center where every element is tailored for harmony in your Boston travels. Our amenities include European-inspired breakfast at an additional cost, free WiFi, 50-inch TVs, flexible workspace and mini-fridges. We also offer a 24-hour fitness center, business services, and meeting spaces for 5 to 80 guests. Find a great selection of quick snacks in the AC Store or join us in the AC Lounge for a nightly selection of tapas-inspired bites. Since we cater to travelers looking to immerse themselves in the energy of downtown, know that from our South End Boston hotel you’re minutes to the heart of the city – to attractions, theater, universities & convention centers, as well as the airport. Welcome to an elevated state of mind.Marriott

name: The Whitney Hotel Boston
description: The Whitney Hotel, a new 65-room luxury hotel, will offer guests generous hospitality through sophisticated simplicity and cultured comforts. Named after Henry Melville Whitney, a prominent Boston industrialist and one-time owner of the hotel site, the property is a haven apart from the urban hustle, welcoming guests with uncomplicated, urbane luxury, complemented by the comforts and indulgences of home. With health and well-being top of mind, we have developed REST ASSURED, a 5-point program designed to ensure guests and staff may be put at ease while on property. Program standards, including advanced cleaning protocols, physical distancing, and transparent communication, are based on guidance from the Centers for Disease Control (CDC), World Health Organization (WHO), and American Hotel and Lodging Association (AHLA). No detail has been left unturned and we thank you for staying with us.iHotelier/iStay

name: The Lenox
description: Centered in Boston's historic Back Bay area, this boutique hotel features a state-of-the-art gym, award-winning dining and elegant rooms with free Wi-Fi. John Hancock Tower is 5 minutes’ walk away. Each room boasts panoramic views of the Back Bay neighborhood. Flat-screen TVs, a small fridge and plush terry bathrobes are provided. The luxury rooms offer mahogany furniture and crystal lamps. Hotel Lenox offers personalized concierge services and a 24-hour business center. Guests can enjoy Irish food at Sólás, an authentic Boston Irish pub. City-Table restaurant serves contemporary American cuisine made from fresh ingredients. Room service is available 24 hours. The Lenox is 3 blocks from famous restaurants and shops on Newbury Street. Fenway Park baseball stadium is just 1 mile from the hotel and Northeastern University is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Hyatt Regency Boston/Cambridge
description: Located 2 miles from Harvard Square, this Cambridge, MA hotel features on-site dining. Boston city center is 3 miles away. A flat-screen cable TV, iPod dock, coffee maker, and free toiletries are included in the rooms at the Hyatt Regency Boston/Cambridge, Overlooking Boston. The rooms also include a sofa and desk. This Hyatt Regency features concierge service and 24-hour front desk assistance. The hotel also has on-site fitness and and offers dining options from Paperback Tavern & Provisions to Paperback Provisions. Massachusetts Institute of Technology is less than a mile from the hotel. Fenway Park, home of the Boston Red Sox baseball team, is 1.8 miles away.
